Summary: two lights traveling in parallel? or one craft.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy boyfriend and I were standing outside our house, We noticed two star like objects coming out of the southeast, moving northwest...traveling at equal distance of each other, perhaps connected. Very strange light hugh, almost irredescent, but still bright. There was absolutely no sound, no blinking, just solid lights. It looked to have been one to two thousand feet up in the air... very eerie.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Harrisburg
There were no other sightings in Harrisburg on or around August 8th 2009
